remarks: The cyclic subgroup generated by ` A ` is a cyclic group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
statement:
cycsubgcyg.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubgcyg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cycsubgcyg.s $e |- S = ran ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x .x. A ) ) $.
cycsubgcyg $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( G |`s S ) e. CycGrp ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
